name: Pixio Perfect
description:
Step into the shoes of PIXIO, a young adventurer out to obtain the grain to produce the loaf (Or, as the gamers say, get the bread). Collect coins, hidden palm islands jacksepticeye icons and jump on the bald heads of the enemies as you traverse through the levels. Oh, and did I mention you might be in for a bit of a rage experience?

Passed all the levels in the game? Feel like your life doesn't have a purpose anymore? Don't fret! You can check your stats and share them with the community through the comments of this page! How many coins did you collect? More importantly, how many hidden items did you find? Were you able to find all 9???

This game was originally developed for the #thankmas charity event, but due to time restrictions, I wasn't able to complete it on time. But a ton of new features was added! This is just the first launch, witch many updates to come. Follow me on Instagram to stay up to date with the game! And if you have a suggestion, critique, or anything else to share, please DM me on Instagram! 

If you like what you see, please consider buying me a cup of coffee. It might be a small gesture for you but it would mean the world to me! Thank you :)
